name: mastodon-alliance-bot
description: Watching alliance hashtags, and following unfollowed accounts.

scripts.start: [ ! -f process.uid ] && UID=`uuidgen`; forever start --uid $UID scripts/streaming.js; echo $UID > process.uid
scripts.stop: [ -f process.uid ] && forever stop `cat process.uid`; rm process.uid

author: guskma
